_source.short_desc: FluentStream is a business phone system that provides all the communications features you need at the best price possible.
_source.long_desc: FluentStream provides communications software that helps your business better serve your customers. Their voice, video, text, and analytics services make it easy to manage and review all of your communications - allowing you to make better business decisions.
_source.pricing_details: Four pricing tiers to meet the needs of your business. Unlimited calls to the US and Canada with first-class quality and guaranteed reliability. With 99.99% uptime, you always have direct access to our expert online knowledge base and US-based customer support team. Opt to customize your business phone system by adding individual features "A-La-Carte" to whichever plan you select.
_source.target_audience: FluentStream provides complete business phone solutions for small, medium and enterprise businesses.

category_features.name: CRM

related_products.short_desc: Complete cloud phone system that is easy to set up and easy to manage.
related_products.features:
RingCentral MVP is a cloud-based business communications system with enterprise-grade voice, fax, text, online meetings, conferencing, and collaboration.

With RingCentral MVP, you can easily connect your office, remote and mobile employees under one phone system, regardless of their location.

Unlike expensive, conventional phone systems, RingCentral MVP is purchased, activated, set up, and managed online, which means we manage it and you use it.

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad modernizes communication technology, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad is a modern cloud-based Unified Communications system that keeps teams connected by making all of their telephony needs available on any device. Dialpad Talk's native Voice Intelligence features boost productivity with real-time transcription and post-call summaries, including highlighted action items. Plus integrations with G Suite, Office 365, Zendesk, and Salesforce create rapid deployments and automatic syncing with the apps your team uses everyday.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM Call Recording - Make, receive, record, and analyze calls without leaving your CRM. With Agile?s built-in call recording and advanced telephony capabilities, you can say goodbye to partial recollection of telephone calls, improve sales performance, and always stay on top of your customer and prospect relationships.

related_products.short_desc: CallHippo is an Easy to Use Phone System while providing world-class support. It can be setup Instant and provide advanced reporting.
related_products.features: CallHippo is a modern business phone system that helps you connect with your customers. CallHippo is easy-to-use while offering robust functionality with advanced features like Power Dailer and Automatic call distribution. Our Extensive reporting and seamless integrations empower sales and service teams to have effective conversations with customers. Providing World-Class support 24*7 and Accessible by desktop and mobile-app, CallHippo is trusted by over 5000 companies worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio provides simple, pay-as-you-go APIs for businesses to build scalable, reliable voice and SMS apps for the web or mobile devices.
related_products.features: Twilio is the worlds leading cloud communication platform that enables you to engage customers across channels - SMS, voice, video, email, WhatsApp and more. Pay-as-you-go APIs allow businesses to scale communications reliably.

related_products.short_desc: EngageBay is a simple, affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software to acquire, engage, nurture, close leads.
related_products.features: EngageBay is a simple, affordable, all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software built for small businesses and startups to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers. Acquire leads through lead generation forms and popups, engage web visitors through beautiful landing pages, nurture them through engaging emails, and automate your marketing funnel through marketing automation - all from one easy to use platform.

related_products.short_desc: CloudTalk is a cloud-based phone system for support and sales teams. We make calling easy and fun! Get your FREE trial today!
related_products.features: CloudTalk is a smart phone system with advanced call tracking functionality.  Over 2,500 businesses - including DHL, Yves Rocher and Glovo - rely on CloudTalk for its superior call quality and call tracking capabilities. Make things easier for your sales and customer support teams with 70+ tracking features and easy integrations with your existing Helpdesk, CRM and eCommerce systems. It's the perfect phone system for mid-sized companies looking to grow. Try a 14-day trial, absolutely FREE.

related_products.short_desc: CallSource helps marketers to prove the lift and value of their campaigns by tracking every call back to what drove them to convert.
related_products.features: Level up your marketing channels - automatic online and offline call tracking. Keyword level dynamic number insertion with the most accurate analytics available. Businesses who want to improve their marketing by optimizing ads, campaigns, keywords, and their content can thrive with our digital marketing solutions.

related_products.short_desc: CallRail's Call Tracking helps you understand what makes your phone right and personalize inbound call experiences.
related_products.features: CallRail's Call Tracking makes it easy for businesses of all sizes to turn more leads into better customers. Serving more than 200,000 businesses and integrating with leading marketing and sales software, our Call Tracking and analytics solutions helps you understand what makes your phone ring and which ad, campaign, or search term got their attention before you pick up the phone.

related_products.short_desc: Close is the all-in-one sales engagement CRM designed to help SMBs turn more leads into revenue.
related_products.features:
Close is the sales engagement CRM designed to help SMBs turn more leads into revenue. At Close, were dedicated to the business of the future: smart, agile teams who work remotely. If you're a tech-enabled team who needs to scale without overpaying for enterprise software, you've found the right sales tool. Close lets you email, call, and text your leads, all without add-ons.

Packed with productivity tools like task reminders and Power Dialer, you'll reach more leads and follow up more often.

similar_products.short_desc: CallRail's Call Tracking helps you understand what makes your phone right and personalize inbound call experiences.
similar_products.features: CallRail's Call Tracking makes it easy for businesses of all sizes to turn more leads into better customers. Serving more than 200,000 businesses and integrating with leading marketing and sales software, our Call Tracking and analytics solutions helps you understand what makes your phone ring and which ad, campaign, or search term got their attention before you pick up the phone.

similar_products.short_desc: Invoca is the leading conversation intelligence platform for revenue teams in marketing, contact centers, eCommerce and CX.
similar_products.features: Invoca's Active Conversation Intelligence platform enables marketing, sales, customer experience, and eCommerce teams to understand and immediately act on the information consumers share via conversations. Through deep integrations with leading technology platforms, revenue teams can turn conversation data into automated action to enhance every digital touchpoint and human interaction, leading to better experiences, more conversions, and higher revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: CTM lets you track & attribute leads, from any source, giving you data to confidently make marketing decisions & increase conversions.
similar_products.features: CallTrackingMetrics is a global conversation analytics provider giving marketers data to make confident strategy decisions. Over 100,000 users, including The Washington Post, Verizon Connect, and ServiceMaster, rely on CTM to make data-driven advertising decisions. CTM integrates with core tools marketers use every day like Google Ads and Analytics, Hubspot, Salesforce, Zoom, and Facebook.

similar_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
similar_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

similar_products.short_desc:
Get marketing clarity, with call tracking.
Tie phone calls to marketing. Instantly capture phone calls and the marketing responsible.
similar_products.features:
Get marketing clarity, with call tracking.
A new lead management tool built for marketers and business owners to capture and measure your marketing effectiveness. See a clear picture of what marketing is growing sales.
Try our 14 Day Free Trial.

Capture Calls. Tie phone calls to marketing. Instantly capture phone calls and the marketing responsible.

similar_products.short_desc: CallSource helps marketers to prove the lift and value of their campaigns by tracking every call back to what drove them to convert.
similar_products.features: Level up your marketing channels - automatic online and offline call tracking. Keyword level dynamic number insertion with the most accurate analytics available. Businesses who want to improve their marketing by optimizing ads, campaigns, keywords, and their content can thrive with our digital marketing solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: Sierragold by SAI's InQuery is a fast, reliable & secure call record query application. Access historical and current CDR,  24/7.
similar_products.features:
Sierragold by SAI's InQuery is a web-based, fast, and reliable call record query application running on the Linux OS. It uses a very current database & other technologies ensuring data security, reliability, and ease of use.  The modern interface allows for efficient searches of historical or current call records. The online application is available 24/7 to authorized personnel using today's top web browsers.   

At SAI our mission is to help enterprises simplify a complex telecom environment.

similar_products.short_desc: LiveVox is a next-generation contact center platform integrating omnichannel communications, CRM, Practical AI, and WFO in one solution
similar_products.features: LiveVox's Call and Screen Recording Capabilities is a fully integrated solution that provides complete visibility on 100% of agent-customer interactions to help drive performance, quality, and compliance via synchronized screen, call, and multichannel recording capabilities. Their Unified platform allows managers to easily search, play, score, and report on multichannel interactions and drop in on live calls.  Recordings are securely stored in the LiveVox cloud and readily accessible.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one sales automation solution that includes call tracking and call routing. Route calls via shotgun, round-robin, or criteria.
similar_products.features:
ClickPoint is an all-in-one sales and marketing solution to improve sales contact rates dramatically.  
ClickPoint clients contact more than 50% of their leads on average, and reach contact rates as high a as 70%. ClickPoint makes it easy for salespeople to dial their prospects while automated texting and email marketing reach customers at the right time in their buying journey.

similar_products.short_desc: Call Tracking Software that tracks all inbound and outbound calls, increases sales, and analyzes metrics with ease.
similar_products.features: LeadSquared's Call Tracking Software integrates perfectly with CallTrackingMetrics to improve caller experience and track all inbound and outbound calls. Capture all inbound phone calls and voicemails, directly make outbound calls, avoid lead duplication, maintain call logs and reports, route incoming calls to the right agents, and more. Monitor the number of calls received, outbound calls made, missed calls, calls that led to conversions, average time spent, etc.

similar_products.short_desc: Our products include: Auto Dialer, Cloud Phone System, Progressive Dialer, CRM & Lead Management, and Email & SMS Marketing Automation.
similar_products.features: Ricochet360 is the All-in-One Auto Dialer, CRM/Lead Management, and Marketing Automation Platform that creates predictable revenue outcomes by automating 95% of your agents daily sales workflow. Designed for both inbound & outbound agents looking for a competitive advantage, Ricochet360 enables your team to call a new lead in less than one second, then automatically nurture and engage prospects throughout the entire sales process.

similar_products.short_desc: Find out which ads drive calls with Ringostat Call Tracking. Know which ad, campaign, or keyword got attention of your customers.
similar_products.features:
Find out which ads drive calls. 
If your business relies on quality customer conversations, you need Ringostat. Special offer! Get Ringostat with a benefit of up to 30% until 30.09.22

Use call tracking opportunities to maximize marketing impact and generate more sales for the same budget. Ringostat has everything you need to solve this task as efficiently as possible: 97% accuracy, Smart substitution script, Calls segmentation, Recording and listening of calls etc.

similar_products.short_desc: Turn website visitors into sales calls.  Use CallPage and provide immediate free phone callback to your leads in 28 seconds.
similar_products.features:
CallPage is an industry leader in providing automatic callback software and call tracking solutions. 

With customizable widgets, CallPage enables businesses to generate up to 75% more inbound calls from their website visitors! Visitors can request instant calls and CallPage will connect them to your consultant in just 28 seconds. 

CallPage is also ideal for customer service and call centers.  With call scheduling and voice messaging features, you can improve your customers' experience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

pricing_plans.name: Essential
pricing_plans.description: This plan provides you with all the features that will help with your everyday business tasks. It charges you $20 per user per month.

pricing_plans.name: Advanced
pricing_plans.description: This plan includes the advanced features required to meet most of the needs of a small business. It charges you $30 per user per month. The plan includes all the features from the essential plan along with additional features.

pricing_plans.name: Complete
pricing_plans.description: This plan includes all the features that are needed by the call centers and sales teams. It charges you $45 per user per month. The plan includes all the features from the advanced plan along with additional features.

_source.short_desc: FluentCloud is a cloud based business phone system that focuses on being more affordable for your business and improving reliability.
_source.long_desc: FluentStream has created a  business phone system with customer service in mind. With your agents constantly handling customer inquires in the form of calls, chats and tickets, you need a smooth running machine to ensure the best agent productivity and customer satisfaction by decreasing hold times and ensuring a first call resolution every time.
_source.pricing_details: Four pricing tiers to meet the needs of your business. Unlimited calls to the US and Canada with first-class quality and guaranteed reliability. With 99.99% uptime, you always have direct access to our expert online knowledge base and US-based customer support team. Opt to customize your business phone system by adding individual features "A-La-Carte" to whichever plan you select.
_source.target_audience: FluentStream provides complete business phone solutions for small, medium and enterprise businesses.

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk Support is the leading help desk software built to improve customer satisfaction.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
related_products.features: Freshdesk is a cloud-based helpdesk system that offers powerful solutions for customer service. Freshdesk unifies conversations from email, phone, web, chat and social, and helps you resolve issues across channels effortlessly. With Freshdesk, you can also automate workflows, offer convenient self-service options, manage SLAs, and generate reports. Freshdesk is used by over 50,000 customers, including Bridgestone, HP, Harvard University and DHL.

related_products.short_desc: ConnectWise Control provides the ability to view and control devices from anywhere there is an Internet connection.
related_products.features: ConnectWise Control (formerly ScreenConnect) is a fully functional remote support solution. The software gives you the ability to remotely view and control devices from anywhere there is an Internet connection. As a technician, regardless if you primarily support your customers personal computers or a huge enterprise infrastructure, the ability to quickly and effectively resolve problems allows you to save time and improve customer satisfaction.

related_products.short_desc: Put customer service at the heart of your company. Make agents more productive, managers more impactful and customers more empowered.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is the industry's favourite customer service software with contextual AI that helps you to streamline your customer care, automating routine and managing multiple customer interactions gets easier on cloud. This includes conversations spread across various channels like email, phone, social media, live chat, and more, all from a single interface. Naturally, our free plan gives you 3 users free to help you get a head start with your customer service operations.

related_products.short_desc: LiveChat enables you to have real-time conversations with your customers while they are on your website.
related_products.features: LiveChat provides a cost-effective way for your support team to deliver a great experience across the entire customer journey. It makes customer service more efficient by letting you hold multiple chat sessions at the same time, send canned responses to frequently asked questions, add chat tags, review chat transcripts and send files to customers through the chat window.

related_products.short_desc: Great customer service starts with better customer service software. Impress your customers and increase their satisfaction.
related_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured Customer Service software with over 195+ integrations. 

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-Day free trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
related_products.features: Intercom enables personalized customer service at scale, increasing customer satisfaction and support team efficiency. Powered by a modern messenger, smart automation and self-service tools, along with all the features you need from a modern support solution including a next-gen omnichannel inbox, conversation routing, workload management, reporting and more.

related_products.short_desc: Easy to implement web-based Customer Service software with a focus on B2B customer management and team collaboration.
related_products.features: TeamSupport is a post-sale customer support software solution built specifically for the unique needs of B2B technology-enabled companies. Built around the entire B2B customer, rather than a focus on each individual contact or ticket, TeamSupport helps solve for sophisticated client needs, fuels successful client interactions, and ultimately results in increased lifetime customer value. Nationally recognized TeamSupport suite of solutions includes TeamInsights, and TeamSuccess.

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk Support is the leading help desk software built to improve customer satisfaction.
similar_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
similar_products.features: Intercom enables personalized customer service at scale, increasing customer satisfaction and support team efficiency. Powered by a modern messenger, smart automation and self-service tools, along with all the features you need from a modern support solution including a next-gen omnichannel inbox, conversation routing, workload management, reporting and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Help Scout's customer service software has the features you need to keep things simple, move fast, and focus on delighting customers.
similar_products.features: With Help Scout, you can be available everywhere your customers need help, while giving your team the collaboration, organization, and automation tools they need to move faster. Deliver email, self-service, and live chat support from one powerful platform that feels just like your inbox. Answer 52% more emails with ease and reduce your support volume by 30%. You'll have happier customers and fewer support requests - everyone wins.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to implement web-based Customer Service software with a focus on B2B customer management and team collaboration.
similar_products.features: TeamSupport is a post-sale customer support software solution built specifically for the unique needs of B2B technology-enabled companies. Built around the entire B2B customer, rather than a focus on each individual contact or ticket, TeamSupport helps solve for sophisticated client needs, fuels successful client interactions, and ultimately results in increased lifetime customer value. Nationally recognized TeamSupport suite of solutions includes TeamInsights, and TeamSuccess.

similar_products.short_desc: Front is more than a communication hub - it's how 7500+ companies build lasting business relationships.
similar_products.features: Yes-you can scale and keep the human touch. Front is a customer communication hub that combines the simplicity of the email inbox with the automation and insights of a CRM. Front makes it easy for teams to send personalized replies faster, organize messages across channels, and always delight a customer. As your needs change, Front's flexible workflows change with you. Teams of 5 and 5,000 alike use Front to scale their communication without compromising on quality or efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: Put customer service at the heart of your company. Make agents more productive, managers more impactful and customers more empowered.
similar_products.features: Zoho Desk is the industry's favourite customer service software with contextual AI that helps you to streamline your customer care, automating routine and managing multiple customer interactions gets easier on cloud. This includes conversations spread across various channels like email, phone, social media, live chat, and more, all from a single interface. Naturally, our free plan gives you 3 users free to help you get a head start with your customer service operations.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Freshdesk is a cloud-based helpdesk system that offers powerful solutions for customer service. Freshdesk unifies conversations from email, phone, web, chat and social, and helps you resolve issues across channels effortlessly. With Freshdesk, you can also automate workflows, offer convenient self-service options, manage SLAs, and generate reports. Freshdesk is used by over 50,000 customers, including Bridgestone, HP, Harvard University and DHL.

similar_products.short_desc: Unnecessary support tickets are costly. Add interactive guides to high ticket articles to decrease tickets & drive self-serve success.
similar_products.features: Allow users to self-serve toward success where and when it's needed with Stonly. Build interactive guides that adapt to each customer's situation and provide them with the exact information they need to be successful. Add guides to your website with no code, include them in your help center or build an interactive knowledge base. See why 1,000's of companies trust Stonly to provide unparalleled support.

similar_products.short_desc: Ada is an easy to use customer support automation platform.
similar_products.features: As the market leader in Automated Customer Experience (ACX), Ada personalizes customer engagement by putting the power of AI in the hands of the people who know your business best. With Ada, it's simple for non-technical teams to build an automated, enterprise-class chatbot platform that solves 70%+ of customer inquiries.

similar_products.short_desc: Kustomer is the omnichannel SaaS CRM platform reimagining enterprise customer service to deliver standout experiences.
similar_products.features:
Kustomer is the top-rated CRM, helping top brands deliver modern customer service that creates customers for life. Powered by AI, Kustomer scales to meet the needs of contact centers and businesses, enabling companies to deliver effortless, consistent and personalized service and support through a single timeline view.

Founded in 2015 by serial entrepreneurs Brad Birnbaum and Jeremy Suriel, Kustomer has raised over $174M in venture funding.

similar_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
similar_products.features: Deliver great service and a flexible agent experience, from anywhere. Give agents a holistic view of every customer, whether they're in the contact center or working remote. Scale and optimize service by leveraging AI and integrating popular support channels - like phone, messaging, and chat - directly into the agent workspace. Resolve cases faster by combining automated processes with easy access to the full details, context, and history of every case and customer interaction.

similar_products.short_desc: Ticket Management, Customer Success, Customer Experience, Knowledge Base, NPS, CSAT, CES, Customer portal, Mobile apps, CRM data Sync
similar_products.features: Ticketing software Easy to use, Affordable, and Scalable. Built to manage the complexities that teams need to drive customer success and retention. We do this by unifying survey tools, NPS, CSAT, knowledge base, data synchronizations to Salesforce, dashboards, analytics, scheduling tools, team scorecards, and customer success health scoring.

similar_products.short_desc: SMS texting and live chat for business has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.
similar_products.features:
SMS texting and live chat has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.  With no programming required, you can setup your Avochato phone number in minutes to text your prospects, customers, or staff. Segment, import, and broadcast to your contacts to scale your teams communications.

Avochato integrates with platforms such as Salesforce, Slack, MS Teams, and Zapier. Enable prospects to text you from a Google Ad with the AdWords API integration.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Complaint Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Complaint Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Complaint Management software helps to track, organize and resolve customer complaints and maximizes the productivity of the employees who deal with customers directly. These solutions are characterized by the ability to accurately capture, classify and route complaints, enabling communication across the team and insuring compliance. Complaint Management software is related to Customer Satisfaction software, Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer requests across different communication channels.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Chat software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Chat tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Chat software helps organizations connect with their customers in real time. Live Chat applications can be used for customer support, lead generation, and customer engagement. This type of software includes widgets that can be integrated into existing websites, as well as more robust stand alone solutions that allow businesses to track customer interactions, response and conversion rates.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Online CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Online CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Online CRM software enables web-based customer interaction, support and relationship management. Online customer relationship management applications provide customers with access to an organization's knowledge base assets, allowing customers to pursue a self-guided path to resolving product-related issues, either via the web or over the phone. Online CRM solutions can help increase the efficiency and utility of a call center, website or help desk by empowering customers to resolve issues on their own without engaging with customer service staff. Online CRM software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

pricing_plans.name: Essential
pricing_plans.description: This plan provides you with all the features that will help with your everyday business tasks. It charges you $20 per user per month.

pricing_plans.name: Advanced
pricing_plans.description: This plan includes the advanced features required to meet most of the needs of a small business. It charges you $30 per user per month. The plan includes all the features from the essential plan along with additional features.

pricing_plans.name: Complete
pricing_plans.description: This plan includes all the features that are needed by the call centers and sales teams. It charges you $45 per user per month. The plan includes all the features from the advanced plan along with additional features.
